name: Museum Guard
description:
Protect The museum from misbehaviour visitors.

this is my first video game published, I didn't post it as a webGL because the unity version that I was working currently has audeio issues, not what I intended, I want poeple to play games directly in browser insted  of having to download them, either way when the problem gets patched I will update it.

looking for players inputs, any ideias I will implement in the game.

no webGL because the unity version that I started this project had probles with webGL audio

video vlog published in my youtube channel
